sentences.sentence: The second house that Grossman had a snoop around contained "strong simple furniture."
sentences.translation: 格罗斯曼窥探过的第二所房子有“结实简朴的家具。”

sentences.sentence: He had a snoop around her office.
sentences.translation: 他在她的办公室窥探一番。

sentences.sentence: This whole-country-rental idea started with rapper Snoop Dogg.
sentences.translation: 这个“出租国家”的灵感得益于美国说唱歌手“史努比狗狗”。
